Package nl.pim16aap2.util.logging

Class LogBackConfigurator

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.util.logging.LogBackConfigurator
public class LogBackConfigurator extends Object
Represents a configuration tool for the LogBack backend used by Flogger (via slf4j).
Author:
Pim

    • addAppender

      public LogBackConfigurator addAppender(LogBackConfigurator.AppenderSpecification appenderSpecification)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The current configurator.

    • addAppender

      public LogBackConfigurator addAppender(String name, String clz, @Nullable @Nullable String pattern)
      Adds an appender to the logger.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the appender.
      clz - The fully specified name of the appender class as returned by Class.getName(). E.g. "my.package.logging.MyAppender".
      pattern - The pattern to use for the formatting of the messages logged by the appender. E.g. "%-5level [%thread]: %message%n". See LogBack Chapter 6: Layouts.
      Returns:
      The current configurator.

    • addAppender

      public LogBackConfigurator addAppender(String name, String clz)
      See addAppender(String, String, String).
